input.sentences: this was the hotel we were staying in for the olympics .
we had to drive all the way down the road to park .
a lot of the apartment buildings were rented out for the event .
there were not a lot of people around yet .
the sign was up and ready .
output.sentences: I was driving around the town where the olympic games were to be played and noticed this hotel on the corner.
Not being too familiar with the place I continued to drive as i noticed how barren the town looked.
I will say it was a clean place, probably done so that all of the visitors would give them high marks for their hospitality.
So remarkable , how big the city is and even more so how the environment lends itself to a myriad of living and sculptural designs to facilitate the olympic styles of the pr=erformers.
The olympic symbol over near  the dome really let us know that we were in the right place.
